params._to: The recipient of the claimed token

init(address[],uint256[]).details: Validating via INITIALIZER makes deployments cheaper than storing `bool initialized`, but INITIALIZER must be trusted to not call more than once.

params._splitPercentages: The ordered split percentages corresponding to _users
params._users: The users to give a split percentage

params._amount: The desired amount of shares to claim and redeem
params._redeemContract: The contract to call to redeem
params._redeemData: The encoded params with which to call _redeemSelector

claimToken(address).notice: Claims the full amount of a specified token

claimTokenAmountTo(address,uint256,addre.notice: Claims a specified token amount to a specified address

getSplitPercentageForUser(address).notice: Gets the split ratio percentage for a given user

getTokenBalClaimableForUser(address,addr.notice: Gets the token balance claimable for a specified user

getTokenBalClaimedForUser(address,addres.notice: Gets the token balance already claimed for a given user

getTotalTokenBalClaimed(address).notice: Gets the total token balance already claimed

redeemShares(address,uint256,address,byt.notice: Claims and redeems shares as specified
